thread.title: Bad Mouth: Lady becomes unconscious after ‘Keke’ rider gave her a blow for insulting him
thread.title_full: Bad Mouth: Lady becomes unconscious after ‘Keke’ rider gave her a blow for insulting him

author: Isaac Dachen
title: Bad Mouth: Lady becomes unconscious after ‘Keke’ rider gave her a blow for insulting him
text: A lady who could not keep her saucy tongue in check ended up in a gutter after a ‘Keke Marwa’ (tricycle rider) she insulted gave her a heavy blow that saw her losing consciousness. ALSO READ : “Iron Man: Policeman breaks woman’s jaw for hiding lover’s whereabouts” According to an eyewitness who posted the incident on his Facebook page, the lady was on her way to work early in the morning around the Bariga area of Lagos State, when she got into an altercation with the Keke rider. She was said to have insulted the living daylight out of the tricycle rider and when the man could no longer take the lady’s insults, he allegedly got down from his machine and approached the lady who dared the man to touch her and see what would happen to him. ALSO READ : “In Ado-Ekiti: Man arraigned before court for slapping girlfriend” Taking up the challenge, the man was said to have given her a blow to the head and after spinning around, she fell into the gutter and became unconscious while the man climbed back into his tricycle and escaped from the scene while sympathizers managed to bring her out of the gutter and rushed her to a nearby hospital.
